amendment.description: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to transfer $914,000 from the Department of Commerces Departmental Management, Salaries and Expenses account to the Office of the Inspector General's account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jeffries amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Jeffries.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jeffries amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
